CustomField.description: This flag specifies if Optimization Insights shall be captured automatically i.e. For Any optimization Request. This option is better suited for Non Prod environments i.e. UAT, Dev etc. For Production, use a scheduled job to capture Optimization Insights.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This flag specifies if Optimization Insights shall be captured automatically i.e. For Any optimization Request. This option is better suited for Non Prod environments i.e. UAT, Dev etc. For Production, use a scheduled job to capture Optimization Insights.
CustomField.label: Automatic Insights Enabled
